title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 420.10 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 420.10 - Records

State Regulations
(a) Each steam
corporation shall maintain records documenting all inspections, maintenance, tests, etc., required by this Part. (b) Notwithstanding the requirements of Part
292 or Appendix 4-A of this Title, the minimum period of retention of records
required by this Part shall be three years. Longer periods of retention may be
mandated by Part 292 and Appendix 4-A of this Title. (c) All records, or copies thereof, shall be
kept on file in the State of New York and shall be readily accessible to the
staff of the New York State Department of Public Service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
420.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
